title: Skiing The Back Country Is Intoxicating, And Dangerous
teaser: Two promising young skiers died in an avalanche in Austria this week. In Yosemite, two climbers are scaling El Capitan. NPR's Scott Simon gets the latest from Outside Magazine's Grayson Schaffer.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
